attributes.title: I am horrified
attributes.review: So I got this app to see what my president has to say to his fans and I am horrified there was a disgusting image of a horse doing violent things with a pig, and let me just say I am scarred for life and ashamed to have Mr. Trump as my president please be careful before you get this app the images on it are truly disgusting and horrifying #pleasedontvotefortrump2029
